src_original: 'trīṇyarakṣyāṇi' iti /  pariśuddhakāyasamudācārastathāgato nāsti tasyāpariśuddhakāyasamudācāratā yāṃ tathāgataḥ

'trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni' yathāpāṭham- “tathāgatasya dharma deśayata ekatyāḥ śuśrūṣante /  śrotramavadadhati /  ājñācittamupasthāpayanti pratipadyante dharmasyānudharmam /  na tena tathāgatasya nandī bhavati na saumanasyaṃ na cetasa utplāvitatvam /
na tena tathāgatasyāghāto nākṣāntirnāpratyayaḥ na cetaso 'nabhirāddhiḥ /
ekatyāḥ śuśrūṣante /  ekatyā na suśrūṣante /  na tena tathāgatasya dvayaṃ bhavati nandī āghātaśca /
